ValidationRule.description: ConSept Accounts Cannot have more than 3 included products
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
(This_is_Included_Product__c = true) ,
OR( Value__c >0, Value__c <0,(Quantity__c >2)) ,
( X20_Group_Account_Member__c <> NULL)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This is a Proprietary Group included product - you cannot edit the quantity to be more than 3.
